pages.text: This chapter covers all early game machines.$(br2)All machines fit into one of 5 tiers:$(br)$(thing)$(l)Coal-powered$(), $(thing)$(l)Steam-powered$(), $(thing)$(l)LV$(), $(thing)$(l)MV$() & $(thing)$(l)HV$().$(br)Any machine beyond MV is covered somewhere else!

pages.title: Alloy Blast Furnace
pages.text: The $(item)$(l)Alloy Blast Furnace$() is a crucial part of the early game, making alloys as steel and conductive copper possible.$(br)However, it's a wise decision to use some electric alternative later on in the game.
